mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, name, email, password, created_at, modified_at) values (#{user_id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, password = #{password} where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select user_id, name, email, password, created_at, modified_at from user where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
